gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: COAWST simulation of CBLAST 2007 region south of Marthas Vineyard, including the Martha's Vineyard Coastal Observatory Region. This simulation is CASE07_AR0FD. Ripple formulation with SWAN-40m resolution wave forcing.
